name: Assign value 'Hello' to the `str` variable
instruction:
![](https://course-qa-basics.s3.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/section-2-course-1-task-13.png)

Create a variable named `str`. 
Use the keyword `let`.
Assign a value - the string `Hello`.

Related example:
```javascript
let string = 'World';
```
